mapper.select: SELECT a.reply_no , a.review_no , a.mem_id , b.mem_name , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS reply_date FROM replys a, members b WHERE 1=1 AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.reply_no = #{replyNo}

SELECT a.reply_no , a.review_no , a.mem_id , b.mem_name , a.reply_content , TO_CHAR(a.reply_date, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS reply_date FROM replys a, members b WHERE 1=1 AND a.mem_id = b.mem_id AND a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.review_no = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY a.reply_date ASC
